g++   -fPIC -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -fvisibility=hidden -DNDEBUG    -O3 -Wstrict-aliasing=0 -ffast-math    CMakeFiles/tutorial07_ispc.dir/tutorial07.o tutorial07_device.dev.o tutorial07_device.dev_sse2.o tutorial07_device.dev_sse4.o tutorial07_device.dev_avx.o tutorial07_device.dev_avx2.o  -o ../../tutorial07_ispc -rdynamic ../../libembree.so.2.3.1 ../../libtutorial.a ../../libimage.a ../../libtransport.a ../../libtutorial_device_ispc.a ../../libembree_sse41.a ../../libembree_sse42.a ../../libembree_avx.a ../../libembree_avx2.a ../../libsimd.a ../../liblexers.a -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lglut -lXmu -lXi -ljpeg ../../libsys.a -lpthread -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/gyz/code/work/embree-cl
